title: imac 21.5" 2013 - similar boards
message:
I'm working on an 820-3482 board but can't find the schematic anywhere.  Does anyone know if any of the older iMac 21.5 boards are close enough?  I mainly work on macbook pros and it seems the schematics don't change too much from year to year (just the board views).

thanks,
Paul

title: imac 21.5" 2013 - similar boards
message: Probably the 820-3302 from 2012. What is the issue with the board?

title: imac 21.5" 2013 - similar boards
message: 120V was run through one of the USB ports - less damage then I thought I would see (someone stuck the end of a USB cord into an outlet).  I removed some of the blown USB port chips but didn't want to go any further until I could check for STG/etc.  No boot but I see a green light on the MB.

title: imac 21.5" 2013 - similar boards
message: I would say this board is totally fried.....

title: imac 21.5" 2013 - similar boards
message: Would totally agree - told the customer the same but hoping to spend a couple of hours on it and maybe pull a rabbit out of the hat ;>

title: imac 21.5" 2013 - similar boards
message: Can I advice you not to waste your time?
